TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that specify the level that a menu item is displayed at in the ribbon Application Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem.Level%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel Middle = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The menu item is displayed in the middle level.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel Sub = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The menu item is displayed in the lowest level.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The menu item is displayed in the top level.
